body.name: SHAPERX Bodysuit for Women Tummy Control Shapewear Seamless Sculpting Thong Body Shaper Tank Top
features: 【Sizing Tips】Follow our size chart and measure your bust,waist and hip. You may be surprised how "tiny" the bodysuit looks during 1st time try-on. But don't worry, the bodysuit is purposely designed with super stretchy fabric so that it will hug you in all right places!

Tummy Control Bodysuit : This seamless shapewear holds in your core, lifts your chest, and smooths your abdomen. Its whisper-soft and seamless construction makes this sculpting piece a necessity for enhancing your body' natural shape.

Comfortable Material: Thong full Bodysuit is made of high-quality fabric, lightweight, stretchy, and skin-friendly. The breast area is made of breathable mesh material, easy and comfortable for all-day long wearing.
No Compression Bra Design: Adjustable straps and no compression bra design fit for all cups.Full back coverage smooths upper Back.Snap closure at crotch for easy maneuvering.

Occasion: The shapewear is invisible beneath your daily clothes because of its seamless surface, light color. You can wear it anywhere with any outer clothing, such as shorts, low-cut blouses, skirts. It fits Office, Daily Wear, Sleep, Party, etc.

How do I find my size? Please follow SHAPERX sizing instructions here. For additional assistance, please feel free to send e-mail to us. Is there a bra padded? NO, the fabric over the cups allows for them to be lifted and supported but not squashed and no uniboob either.If you have big breasts, we recommend selecting a size up. Is sculpting bodysuit perfect base to any outfit? Yes. The perfect base for any outfit. Once you nail the basics you’ll never be stuck with what to wear again.Casual look, fashion outfits, work outfit , daily outfit , date night outfit. Any compression on the tummy? Trust us, this shapewear can instantly flatten your tummy. Medium, targeted compression for shaping & sculpting. Any question of faja shapewear. If you have any issues about our products or services, please feel free to send e-mail to us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I don't like shapewear lol. I have worn the ones that are sort of like bike shorts but with more tummy coverage a few times for certain events or outfits and they always pinched and would ride down at the waist, but the shorts would also somehow ride up, I was always super sweaty in them and uncomfortable, they would pinch - it was just an all around bad time. So several years ago, I threw in the towel and just decided I would not deal with it anymore lol. I would wear regular bike shorts under dresses or skirts and otherwise it would be fine.And then I got invited to a fancier event for NYE. And I had a dress to wear already in my closet. But it *needed* shapewear to look how I wanted it to. I went on an Amazon hunt and after many hours of searching and reading reviews - I landed on this one. I got the full body shaper that basically looks like a leotard with shorts lol. I sort of snickered at the idea that I could wear this without a bra - I am a DDD, I didn't even try it without a bra on NYE, just pulled this on right over the bra I was wearing - which worked no problem.The wonderful thing about this shaper is that it actually works how it should. It doesn't ride up or down, it doesn't bunch, it is breathable enough that I don't feel like I am dying - and it smooths everything out and provides protection from chub rub. The shorts are short enough for cocktail dresses - and it is easy enough to pull them shorter if need be and adjust the shaper accordingly. I danced the night away, and drank way too much at the after-after party in this shaper lol. And didn't feel uncomfortable once.Now, the fun part - I decided to try wearing this to go out with the girls a few weekends ago with some jeans and a vest that I have always wanted to wear as a shirt - but never felt I could get away with it with my chest. This shaper *actually* worked with my chest. Was it as supportive as a "proper" bra with an underwire? No. Was it more supportive than a bralette? Hell yeah - seriously *so* much better than a bralette. No sagging or weird uni-boob! I loved the amount of support it gave me actually. it looked great with jeans and my vest-as-a-shirt also, but I was so jazzed about how genuinely comfortable I was in it which I never would have actually believed was possible for a bodyshaper.Since then, I have worn it at least 3 other times, to work, or to go out with friends. I've worn it to dinner and had a full meal with no issues, I have sat in the office all day in it and not been uncomfortable. And it gives me such a nice level of support without being restrictive at all. I move around a lot lol - and this doesn't impact me at all. I literally have sometimes forgotten I had it on until I went to use the restroom lol.The only *tiny* thing that I haven't 100% loved about it - is that the bust line is a little high (especially if you are tightening the straps to get as much support as you can lol) so the shaper sometimes would peep out the top of my shirt a bit which I would have liked if it was low enough that didn't happen and so I could get some proper cleavage lol. But overall I adore it and will probably see if there are other necklines by this brand to try out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable to wear all day
reviews.reviewText: I am 5 feet tall and 165 lbs. I am pear-shaped (small chest, small waist, wide hips). The L/XL fit me comfortably and I did not have a problem wearing the bodysuit at work for the entire day. It was just difficult clipping the crotch because I have thick thighs and butt. The S/M was a little hard to squeeze into, but I did it. So, I recommend ordering your true size for daily wear and size down if you’re wearing the body suit for a night out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Size up - works like a charm
reviews.reviewText: I am 5'7" and 150lbs. I ordered a L/XL size which fit. This is easy to get into despite how tiny it looks. I wore this during engagement photos under a dress and under jeans and a shirt. It did it's job and held me in. I would recommend sizing up only because this rode up on my hip an when it did it was very constricting over time with discomfort. As with any of these bodysuits I do not think they are healthy to wear often or for long periods of time. That being said it was worth the $ and worked!I also ordered a M in the tan option with shorts bottom. That fit great and was slightly more comfortable than the thong one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More colors please.
reviews.reviewText: I've bought 2.The nude and the pink one.If you have a heavier chest it feels so comfortable.Tops like this dont ever fit me so, I mainly got this for the sleek compression.When I tried this on everything fits perfectly and looks amazing.The outfit especially holds my heavy chest nicely and comfortably.I dont recommend wearing it all day if you are top heavy b/c it will cut into your shoulders.Oh, and did i mention the amazing compression. 👏My man LOVES ❤️ 😍 me in the pink one.Both are see through though.Im kinda bum about that but I make it work.I would love to get more in other colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I weigh about 140 lbs, have a fluctuating 29-31 inch waist, a long torso, and the Small/Medium fit me perfectly! It wasn’t too tight to where it was uncomfortable or made me feel like I was being squished.It doesn’t work miracles— my lower stomach pooch is still visible with it on —but it works well enough to be my go-to shaper.Because the material is so soft, I don’t have to wear a slip under my dresses to avoid bunching, either.Word of warning, though, if you have a smaller bust, like me, it’s definitely going to compress things. Personally, I like that look for myself, so it was a pleasant surprise, but I know it isn’t for everyone.While the compression could hold everything in place for a smaller bust, there still isn’t any lining on the cups, so there needs to be something there so things don’t get pointy.Ultimately, it’s a bit pricier than I normally would pay for a shaper (nearly $40 is a lot of money) but it works well enough that it’s worth the cost. The material feels like it’s built to last, and I haven’t managed to tear it yet, even after wearing it 10+ times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: To start, I absolutely hate shapewear. I always feel like it makes me look even bigger and bulky, Its never comfortable. But this one is AMAZING. It literally looks so tiny, it fit my 7 year old 😂 But I squeezed into it and it snatched my stomach right up!! It smoothed everything out and I felt super comfortable and confident in it. I haven’t worn it out yet because I bought it for an upcoming trip. The only downside is does roll up on the sides. 10/10 recommend though. I bought a Large/XL 220lbs and 5’6.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When took this body suit out of the bag, I thought “this looks 5 times too small!!!” And boy are looks deceiving. I was able to easily and smoothly get this body suit on and all my bad areas were smoothed away. It stretched out with ease and did not lose its shape or purpose. The material is like butter and offers good support on the midsection. I felt amazing. I am not big chested so I would feel comfy enough to use it as a regular body suit with some jeans on. I plan on buying other colors to add to my wardrobe. I’m so happy I bought this!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy buena y de buena calidad
reviews.reviewText: Muy buena aunque me quedo un poco grande

Ok so I’m 5’7 160lbs and have 34 DD and I ordered a sm/med as suggested. Was absolutely terrified when I took it out of the bag. Like how tf is my 10lb ham gonna fit in this 5lb bag?! Not to mention I was home alone and was not prepared to have to call EMS to help me escape if and when I got stuck half way into this torture looking device… however I was committed to reviewing this honestly for my fellow ladies so I headed to my room cell in hand (EMS on speed dial) and stripped down. I did NOT undo the crotch hooks for fear I wouldn’t be able to bend to reach them should I get this on so I stepped into it with the ease of a deer on skates. To my shock that baby stretched to slide up my thighs like a charm. Getting it over my hips was a little more effort but once there it was snug but not uncomfortable. I felt supported. I pulled the straps over each shoulder and tucked my store bought bazzungas into the top half. Now let me tell you, when you have a big top half you don’t go Willy nilly with support but this miraculous contraption held the girls more securely than my hubby the first time he got access to them. I was in! And when I turned to look in the mirror I was shocked to see the hourglass figure this baby enhanced. I’m talking damn girl! So, if you’re on the fence cause your stupid instagram feed keeps baiting you with random fake companies, just do it. It’s the real deal and totally worth it.

reviews.reviewerName: Love this cover, fits great and the colors look fantastic!
reviews.reviewText: There was a miss up with my order, but the problem was resolved very promptly and sent back out quickly. The shaper fits perfectly and does what it's supposed to. Thank you.

This is amazing but the shipping takes a lot of time. I love the quality it really helps to shape my body. The tighter the better. If you’re thinking buying this choose the size you want to look like, if you are large better get what smaller size you want to look like. Since its stretchable.

Followed the sizing chart, but honestly should’ve sized down. It does it’s job but it definitely doesn’t make you go “wow i look snatched around the waist”. It does suck in the stomach JUUUUST a little bit, it’s pretty comfortable as well just wished it was slightly more compressed around the waist area to give you that proper hourglass lookDon’t get why people are saying that the bra isn’t padded when it’s already stated in the description that’s there is no compression in the padding, just wear a bra ladies 😂
